Headline: #79 79th Temporary Westbound  Reroute near 79th/Drexel
ShortDescription: Westbound 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Greenwood, 76th, Cottage Grove, over normal route on 79th: due to street blockage near 79th/Drexel.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Greenwood, 76th, Cottage Grove, over normal route on 79th: due to street blockage near 79th/Drexel.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
